Package org.apache.turbine.services.avaloncomponent

Schnittstelle AvalonComponentService

Alle Superschnittstellen:
Initable, Service, org.apache.avalon.framework.service.ServiceManager, TurbineServiceProvider
Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
TurbineYaafiComponentService
public interface AvalonComponentService extends Service, org.apache.avalon.framework.service.ServiceManager, TurbineServiceProvider
This service allows access to avalon components.
Version:
$Id$
Autor:
Quinton McCombs, Henning P. Schmiedehausen
